content: Income before income taxes from our three core businesses was ¥57 billion, up 60% from last quarter as wholesale performance improved due to the impact from transactions with a U.S. client no longer present. Fixed income revenues were ¥70.7 billion, AEJ and Japan credit had a solid quarter, but macro products such as rates and FX emerging markets declined 20% on lower client activity. At the same time, in our core businesses, Retail saw recurring assets and recurring revenue hit a record high and net inflows into investment trusts and discretionary investments have continued into October.
